ObjectDescription.title: This is the title of object type
ObjectDescription.description: An interface designed to test JSON schema's object description.

deprecated.description:
Deprecated property.

If `@deprecated` comment tag being utilized, the property will be marked as
deprecated in the JSON schema.

title.title: This is the title
title.description: Title tag can replace the first line of the comment.

descriptions.description:
Description property.

If you write first line and the first line ends with "." character, it
would be considered as the title. By the way, description does not
exclusive the title, so that full content be written.

newLine.description:
New line before dot character

If dot character (".") being used before the first new line, it would not
be considered as title in the JSON schema.
